name: Domino Hunt
description:
Click the domino on the board that matches the goal domino (in colors or dots, but not necessarily orientation) shown at the bottom of the screen. For each correct click, your score will go up; for each misclick, your score will go down until it's zero. How high can you score before the one-minute clock runs out of time?

If you click around at the bottom of the page, you can find the following features:

  • Play/Pause (clock at the bottom right);
  • Switch domino type from color-based to classic black-and-white with dots, or vice versa (the square next to the speaker button);
  • Mute and unmute the music by clicking the speaker button (note that the music only plays when the clock is running, i.e. when the game is not paused);
  • In color mode, choose from two alternative domino color palettes, for a total of three different contrast levels;
  • Rotate the goal domino by clicking it;
  • (And one more for you to find!)

The music is from Sonatina No. 1.
